General.Name: Visagar Polytex Limited
General.Description: Visagar Polytex Limited engages in the design, manufacture, wholesale, retail, and trade of textiles in India. The company offers ethnic wear, including sarees, lehengas, and suits; interlining goods; and various fabrics. It also operates a retail chain that offers apparel and ethnic wear under the Vividha brand. In addition, the company is involved in the contract-based manufacturing activity. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Mumbai, India.
